PATIENT_ID: TEST_NAT_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-26 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-26 14:10:00
12-year-old male, skateboard accident witnessed by multiple bystanders.
Fell from ramp, right forearm deformity. BP 110/70, HR 90, RR 18, GCS 15.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-26 14:30:00
Right forearm fracture confirmed on imaging. Mechanism consistent with injury.
Splint applied. Discharged with orthopedic follow-up.
